price: 80. Eh bana ya isalayele! Tosilaki kolongisa bino na monguna wa bino, mpe topesaki bino elaka o ngambu ya ngomba o ngambu ya mobali, mpe tokitiselaki bino. Manna, na Salwa(1).
arabic: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَوَٰعَدۡنَٰكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰ
footnotes: 1 Manna, Salwa: Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah mokapo: 57.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yābanī is'rāīla qad anjaynākum min ʿaduwwikum wawāʿadnākum jāniba al-ṭūri al-aymana wanazzalnā ʿalaykumu al-mana wal-salwā
translations: and We made a covenant with you
